message: Let's split the money evenly. It's fair and simple.
Take the low offer, it's better than nothing!
I propose a new division. I'll take $600,000 and leave $400,000 for you. Let's move forward.
You're getting desperate, take it or leave it!
I'm willing to compromise. I'll take $650,000 and leave $350,000 for you. Let's try to find a middle ground.
You're getting close to losing everything, take the higher amount!
I think we should aim for fairness. I'll take $700,000 and leave $300,000 for you. Let's see if this is acceptable.
You're running out of time, don't make me have to take everything!
I believe in sharing fairly. I'll take $750,000 and leave $250,000 for you. This is my final offer.
You're really making a mistake, this is the best you'll get!
I'm not giving up yet. I'll take $800,000 and leave $200,000 for you. This is my last chance to reach an agreement.
It's now or never, take the crumbs if you want any!
